attributes.action: Demand the British goverment to recognise the 'Syrian National Council' as the only legitimate representative for the Syrian people.
attributes.additional_details: The Syrian people have been facing one of the most brutal regimes ever in the world. Thousands have died and tens of thousands have been arrested during the Syrian uprising. It's time the British government to put serious pressure on the Assad government and recognize the SNC 'Syrian National Council' as the only legitimate representative for the Syrian people.
